title: SOMEONE STOLE MY MAIN ACCOUNT
body:
someone of my LoL friends offered me free rp and i gave him my password and username...stupid i know. He changed my password and the E-Mail.

Please help me get back my main account

What can i do ???

replies.body: Both you and your friend should reach out to us, because it's possible his own account was compromised if it's sending phishing links.  Hit us up through an [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416) so our account team can help you directly with recovery.  See you there!
